test_1.description: Classify AI mentions as non-LLM, LLM, or Agentic

classifications.text_preview: We’re also pioneering new ways of working which both unlock capacity and help individuals finda mean...
classifications.reason: The AI-powered talent marketplace 'Flex' matches skills to projects, which falls under traditional AI/ML for recommendation and matching.

classifications.text_preview: To capitalise on these consumer trends, we’re building our marketing capability to support the growt...
classifications.reason: The text mentions 'AI-powered innovation tools to spot trends early and test new product concepts,' which falls under the category of predictive analytics and trend analysis, a traditional AI/ML application rather than LLMs or agentic AI.

classifications.text_preview: W ith sustainability an important consideration in many consumers’ buying decisions, we’re working w...
classifications.reason: The text mentions AI being used to sort plastic packaging for recycling. This application falls under the category of computer vision and general automation, which are considered traditional AI/ML techniques rather than LLMs or agentic AI.
